value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of creating deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Learn how to investigate and diagnose problems in your Azure virtual networks by using Network Watcher and other tools.

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

value.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Introduction to Windows Virtual Desktop in Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Windows Virtual Desktop to deliver remote desktop and remote app experiences in Microsoft Azure.

value.title: An overview of Azure Data Explorer (ADX) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Manoj Raheja joins Lara Rubbelke to demonstrate Azure Data Explorer (ADX) and provide an overview of the service from provisioning to querying. ADX is a fast, fully managed data analytics service for real-time analysis on large volumes of streaming data. It brings together a highly performant and scalable

value.title: An overview of Azure Integration Services | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Integration Services brings together API Management, Logic Apps, Service Bus, and Event Grid as a reliable, scalable platform for integrating on-premises and cloud-based applications, data, and processes across your enterprise. value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.
